results.title: MetfOrmin BenefIts Lower Extremities with Intermittent Claudication (MOBILE IC): randomized clinical trial protocol
results.text_hl: In accordance with trial design and reporting guidelines, sample size calculations focused on the primary outcome and efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Intermittent_Claudication</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007383 @@@IC@@@.
